hopobject.body:
Recommended BeagleBoard Peripherals

How do I know what peripherals I need or want?

Specific recommendations

5V power supplies

The power adapter needs to provide 5V over a 5.5mm outer diameter and 2.1mm inner diameter barrel connector. A length of 9.5mm is more than sufficient. The currently recommended supply current is 2A (or 10W). The actual power consumption will vary greatly with changes on the USB load. Below are some recommended units:

  • Digi-Key-supplied PHIHONG USA PSC12R-050 - Be sure to get the right adapter for your country

I also searching for power adapters on delicious.com and personally tagging any that you find useful, either already on that list or not already on that list.

Sources for further exploration

  • An early BeagleBoard shopping list
  • Bookmarked list of BeagleBoard peripherals on Delicious.com
